Title: Modern Times
Writer: Ray McKinnon (creator), Evan Dunsky (teleplay), Graham Gordy (teleplay), Michael D. Fuller (teleplay), Evan Dunsky (story)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel rediscovers his teen self, first through clothes and music in the attic, then with Jared at a skateboard park. Senator Foulkes bestows his nasty smile and threats on Jon, he calls on...
